title: The Life of Horatio Lord Nelso
creator: Digi-Media-Apps

extendedInfo.description: One of our greatest heroes Lord Nelson was an English flag officer famous for his service in the Royal Navy, particularly during the Napoleonic Wars. Of his several victories, the most well known and notable was The Battle of Trafalgar in 1805, during which he lost his lost his life towards the battle's end.During the battle he bravely stood on deck in full admirals uniform and insignia spurring his men on but making himself an ideal target for enemy marksmen in the rigging, ultimately costing him his life.
